seo.title: Pachai Nirame Lyrics Alaipayuthey
seo.description: Get the complete Pachai Nirame Lyrics Alaipayuthey from Alaipayuthey. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Clinton Cerejo. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
